claim: Recombinant technology leads to a broader immune response that may provide cross-protection, even in a mismatch season.
explanation: Black and white image containing the logos of the U.S. Department of Health & Human Services (HHS) and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) on a solid background. The image only displays organizational logos and contains no data or text regarding recombinant technology, immune responses, or season mismatch; it does not support the claim.
